meanings.definition: Treat (a metal) by heating and cooling to give it the desired properties.
meanings.sent1: The blacksmith was calorizing the metal to make it stronger.
meanings.sent2: The factory is calorizing the steel beams for the new building.
meanings.sent3: The metal was so happy after calorizing, it sparkled in the sunlight.
meanings.sent4: After calorizing, the metal became a superhero, strong and invincible.
meanings.sent5: Calorizing the metal was like giving it a magical shield against wear and tear.
